properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from High Island to Freeport TX out 20 NM; Coastal waters from Freeport to Matagorda Ship Channel TX out 20 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 9 at 9:34PM CST until January 11 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Houston/Galveston TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...South winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and seas
5 to 8 feet expected.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Freeport to Matagorda Ship Channel
TX out 20 NM and Coastal waters from High Island to Freeport
TX out 20 NM.

* WHEN...From 9 AM Friday to midnight CST Friday night.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM FRIDAY TO MIDNIGHT CST FRIDAY NIGHT
